dateline.placeName: OFFICE OF ALL THE YEAR ROUND,

body.p: On coming to town this morning I find your letter of Saturday,About Ouvry’s legal opinion on the action brought against Fechter (see next note) by his acting manager, Humphrey Barnett: see To Ouvry, 6 May &amp nn. and send you enclosed a cheque for the balance of the loan to FechterCharles Albert Fechter (1824-79; Dictionary of National Biography), actor: see Pilgrim Letters 9, p. 405n. – £400.
